forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Low clouds and fog. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing later on. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
